foodItems.name: Cheeseburger
foodItems.description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a sesame seed bun

foodItems.name: Margherita Pizza
foodItems.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil

foodItems.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
foodItems.description: Crisp romaine lettuce topped with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing

foodItems.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
foodItems.description: Pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, and grated Pecorino Romano cheese

foodItems.name: Sushi Combo
foodItems.description: Assorted sushi rolls including California roll, spicy tuna roll, and salmon avocado roll

foodItems.name: BBQ Ribs
foodItems.description: Tender, slow-cooked pork ribs slathered in tangy barbecue sauce

foodItems.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
foodItems.description: Fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce served over steamed rice

foodItems.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
foodItems.description: Creamy fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich Alfredo sauce made with butter, cream, and parmesan cheese

foodItems.name: Margarita Cocktail
foodItems.description: Classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served with a salt rim

foodItems.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
foodItems.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces, served with basmati rice and naan bread

foodItems.name: Caesar Wrap
foodItems.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla

foodItems.name: Beef Tacos
foodItems.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa

foodItems.name: Pad Thai Noodles
foodItems.description: Thai stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce

foodItems.name: Caprese Salad
foodItems.description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, ripe tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze

foodItems.name: Beef Pho
foodItems.description: Vietnamese noodle soup made with beef broth, rice noodles, thinly sliced beef, and fresh herbs
